name: Zombie Hunter (Car98K)
description:
Play as the hunter while you battle the horde of zombies in a forest. Try to survive as much as you can to gain the highest score.

This is another solo project I've made in my free time.  All the programming parts and the designing of the level are done by me. Feel free to suggest and give feedbacks so that I can improve it further. Hope you enjoy! :)

Free assets used

Music and Sfx :

5 Action Chiptunes by Juhani Junkala - opengameart.org

Zombie sound by Catalin Pavel - opengameart.org

8bit Death Whirl by Fupi - opengameart.org

Steampunk Fantasy Voices by xathien - opengameart.org

Interface Sounds by Kenney - opengameart.org

10 8bit coin sounds by Luke.RUSTLTD - opengameart.org

Chewing, Breadstick by InspectorJ - freesound.org

Man Dying by Under7dude - freesound.org

3D Assets and Vfx:

Simple Gems Ultimate Animated Customizable Pack by Auryn Sky - Unity Asset Store

Battle Royale Duo Polyart by Dungeon Mason - Unity Asset Store

Cartoon FX Free by JMO - Unity Asset Store

Cartoon Vehicles - Low Poly Cars by Mighty Handful - Unity Asset Store

Low - Poly Simple Nature Pack by JustCreate - Unity Asset Store

Cartoon Zombie [Sample] by M.eye - Unity Asset Store
